channel.title: Help? - Dwarf Cannon?
channel.description:
ok how can i make it so if u have all the items u can add them together and it makes dwarf cannon and it makes u the owner and u have to buy cannon balls for it
Also if able ONLY ATTACKS NPC And only attacks players in WILD!!
:confused: Thx

item.title: Help? - Dwarf Cannon?
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

Lol that is like superrrr easy. I’m not going to do it for you, but it goes.

if(itemused == CannonBase && usedon == CannonStand) { deleteItem Cannonbase; deleteItem CannonStand; addItem CannonBase and Stand; }

K =]]

Just to let you know if you didn’t, you replace cannonbase and cannonstand with the codes XD.

Read full topic
